name: materials-project
description: A MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that interacts with the Materials Project database, allowing for material search, structure visualization, and manipulation.

MP_API_KEY.description: API key from the Materials Project

tools.name: search_materials_by_formula
tools.description: Search for materials in the Materials Project database by chemical formula. Returns a list of text descriptions for structures matching the given formula.
tools.prompt: Find materials with the chemical formula Fe2O3

chemical_formula.description: The chemical formula of the material

tools.name: select_material_by_id
tools.description: Select a specific material by its material ID. Returns a list of TextContent objects containing the structure description and URI.

tools.name: get_structure_data
tools.description: Retrieve structure data in specified format (CIF or POSCAR). Returns the structure file content as a string.
tools.prompt: Get the CIF file for silicon

tools.name: create_structure_from_poscar
tools.description: Create a new structure from a POSCAR string. Returns information about the newly created structure, including its URI.
tools.prompt: Create a structure from this POSCAR data

poscar_str.description: The POSCAR string of the structure

tools.name: plot_structure
tools.description: Visualize the crystal structure. Returns a PNG image of the structure and a Plotly JSON representation.
tools.prompt: Show me the crystal structure of silicon

duplication.description: The duplication of the structure along a, b, c axes

tools.name: build_supercell
tools.description: Create a supercell from a bulk structure. Returns information about the newly created supercell structure.

bulk_structure_uri.description: The URI of the bulk structure

scaling_matrix.description: 3x3 matrix or list of 3 integers for scaling

tools.name: moire_homobilayer
tools.description: Generate a moiré superstructure of a 2D homobilayer. Returns information about the newly created moiré structure.
tools.prompt: Create a moiré structure of graphene with 5 degree twist

bulk_structure_uri.description: The URI of the bulk structure

interlayer_spacing.description: The interlayer spacing between the two layers in Ångström

max_num_atoms.description: Maximum number of atoms in the moiré superstructure

vacuum_thickness.description: Vacuum thickness in z-direction in Ångström

examples.title: Search for materials
examples.description: Search for materials by chemical formula
examples.prompt: Find materials with the chemical formula Fe2O3

examples.title: Get material by ID
examples.description: Select a specific material by its ID

examples.title: Download structure file
examples.description: Get structure data in CIF format
examples.prompt: Download the CIF file for mp-149

examples.title: Visualize crystal structure
examples.description: Plot the crystal structure of a material
examples.prompt: Show me the crystal structure of silicon

examples.title: Create a supercell
examples.description: Build a supercell from a bulk structure

examples.title: Create moiré structure
examples.prompt: Create a moiré structure of graphene with 3.4Å interlayer spacing and 5° twist angle
